TopicTitle: How do I make a module manager patch override other module manager patches

Articles.Content: I’m making a patch to increase the number of tracking station levels from 3 to 6 and the max level from 250 G to 5 T and I can’t figure out how to make it override OPM’s patch without deleting it. Please help

You need to make your patches run after the patches you want to change.

More: https://github.com/sarbian/ModuleManager/wiki/Patch-Ordering
Moving to the relevant support forum.
